title: Revoke Foundation Manager
content: To revoke foundation manager from a user account (internal or external), use this form https://simpli.at.okta.com/next/new?q=Simpli.fi App - Revoke Foundation Manager&request_type=67fcf53537213600067708f0 This works instantaneously and will create a Jira ticket for logging. For devs that have access and are more comfortable using the API or console directly, check out
